hero.headline: Innovating to Deliver Better Technology
hero.subtitle: Providing advanced chemical and polymer solutions for modern industries

bands.title: Pigment pastes from PT Pakar Kimia Utama are classified into three main systems: Water-Based, Solvent-Based, and Solvent-Free solutions for advanced coating applications.
Advanced silicone technologies engineered to deliver durability, flexibility, and superior performance for demanding industrial applications.
Highly effective preservation systems designed to protect materials against bacteria, fungi, and microbial contamination.
Specialty additives formulated to enhance processing efficiency, stability, and performance across a wide range of industries.

items.title: PT Pakar Kimia Utama at International Coatings Expo 2025
items.excerpt: PT Pakar Kimia Utama participated in the International Coatings Expo 2025, presenting innovative pigment preparations and functional additive solutions to global industry leaders.

items.title: New Water-Based Pigment Paste Launched
items.excerpt: We proudly introduce our latest water-based pigment paste, developed to support environmentally friendly and high-performance industrial applications.

items.title: PT Pakar Kimia Utama Expands Silicone Product Line
items.excerpt: Our silicone portfolio expands with new high-performance polymer systems engineered for advanced manufacturing and industrial processing.

productDetail.defaultDescription: High quality industrial chemical product designed for performance and reliability.
productDetail.longDescription: This product is formulated to deliver excellent performance in demanding industrial applications. It offers superior dispersion, stability, and compatibility with a wide range of systems.
